StringTable.Label: ThuliumCatalyst_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Rare planetary deposit that can be mined for Thulium.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumCatalystL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can be used to mine rare deposits of Thulium useful for certain types of weapons and also increases wealth on planet.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumCatalystL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the yields of Thulium Mines.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumCatalystL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the yields of Thulium Mines.

StringTable.Label: CrystallizedElerium_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Rare planetary deposit that can be mined for Elerium which is used in energy weapons.

StringTable.Label: CrystallizedEleriumL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can be used to mine rare deposits of Crystallized Elerium and increase wealth.

StringTable.Label: CrystallizedEleriumL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the yields of Crystallized Elerium Mines.

StringTable.Label: CrystallizedEleriumL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the yields of Crystallized Elerium Mines.

StringTable.Label: PrometheusStone_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Rare planetary deposit of solidified Promethion that can be mined.

StringTable.Label: PrometheusStoneL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can be used to mine rare deposits of Prometheus Stone which is also valuable in trade.

StringTable.Label: PrometheusStoneL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the yields of Prometheus Stone Mines.

StringTable.Label: PrometheusStoneL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the yields of Prometheus Stone Mines.

StringTable.Label: HeliosOre_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A beautiful exotic metal popular in many luxury items.

StringTable.Label: HeliosOreL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A beautiful exotic metal popular in many luxury items.

StringTable.Label: HeliosOreL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A beautiful exotic metal popular in many luxury items.

StringTable.Label: HeliosOreL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A beautiful exotic metal popular in many luxury items.

StringTable.Label: HyperSilicates_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This exotic material is useful in constructing powerful research databanks.

StringTable.Label: HyperSilicatesL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This exotic material is useful in constructing powerful research databanks.

StringTable.Label: HyperSilicatesL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This exotic material is useful in constructing powerful research databanks.

StringTable.Label: HyperSilicatesL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This exotic material is useful in constructing powerful research databanks.

StringTable.Label: XanthiumDeposit_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A mineral with unusual energy absorption properties, Xanthium is prized by shipbuilders around the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: XanthiumDepositL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This rare metal is prized by shipbuilders around the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: XanthiumDepositL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This rare metal is prized by shipbuilders around the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: XanthiumDepositL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This rare metal is prized by shipbuilders around the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorNanites_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These relics of the past are can be found dormant on many worlds in the galaxy, thought to be the remains of some sort of Precursor system. Endlessly trying to prepare the galaxy for their lost masters, Precursor Nanites can be an effective ground combat weapon.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorNanitesL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Tiny machines increase overall planetary production.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorNanitesL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Tiny machines increase overall planetary production.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorNanitesL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Tiny machines increase overall planetary production.

StringTable.Label: HarmonyCrystals_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These rare and beautiful Crystals, resonate with a gentle hum that instills a sense of wellbeing in most sentient beings.

StringTable.Label: HarmonyCrystalsL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These rare and beautiful Crystals, resonate with a gentle hum.

StringTable.Label: HarmonyCrystalsL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These rare and beautiful Crystals, resonate with a gentle hum.

StringTable.Label: HarmonyCrystalsL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These rare and beautiful Crystals, resonate with a gentle hum.

StringTable.Label: TechapodHive_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These small six limbed semi-intelligent creatures are near perfect mimics, can be trained to do simple tasks, and are often used to take care of menial tasks in the cramped confines of starships.

StringTable.Label: TechapodHiveL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These small creatures can be trained to do menial tasks on starships.

StringTable.Label: TechapodHiveL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These small creatures can be trained to do menial tasks on starships.

StringTable.Label: TechapodHiveL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These small creatures can be trained to do menial tasks on starships.

StringTable.Label: SnugglerColony_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These incredibly furry and soft creatures are the dream pet for all the children of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: SnugglerColonyL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These furry creatures are the dream pet for children in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: SnugglerColonyL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These furry creatures are the dream pet for children in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: SnugglerColonyL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These furry creatures are the dream pet for children in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: UltraSpice_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Everything tastes better with Arnor Spice, "Arnor spice makes it twice as nice!", This precious spice has been known to make fortunes for entire planets.

StringTable.Label: UltraSpiceL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Arnor Spice expands consciousness leading to greater research capabilities.

StringTable.Label: EpimetheusPollen_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The pollen from this rare flower acts as a natural neural clouding agent, allowing for more effective camouflage.

StringTable.Label: EpimetheusPollenL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The pollen from this rare flower acts as a natural neural clouding agent and other exotic chemicals.

StringTable.Label: EpimetheusPollenL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The pollen from this rare flower acts as a natural neural clouding agent and other exotic chemicals.

StringTable.Label: EpimetheusPollenL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The pollen from this rare flower acts as a natural neural clouding agent and other exotic chemicals.

StringTable.Label: ArtocarpusViriles_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This amazing fruit can be a stable food source on even the most arid planets. It does however have the side effect of making most of the known species in the galaxy more fertile.

StringTable.Label: ArtocarpusVirilesL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This fruit is delicious and increases the fertility of most species.

StringTable.Label: ArtocarpusVirilesL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This fruit is delicious and increases the fertility of most species.

StringTable.Label: ArtocarpusVirilesL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This fruit is delicious and increases the fertility of most species.

StringTable.Label: ArableLand_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This fertile land is perfect for farming.

StringTable.Label: FarmL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These minerals boost the yield of farms when used as a fertilizer.

StringTable.Label: FarmL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These minerals boost the yield of farms when used as a fertilizer.

StringTable.Label: FarmL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These minerals boost the yield of farms when used as a fertilizer.

StringTable.Label: MonsatiumDeposit_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These nutrient rich mineral deposits, give a tremendous boost to the yields of farms when used as a fertilizer.

StringTable.Label: MonsatiumDepositL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These minerals boost the yield of farms when used as a fertilizer.

StringTable.Label: MonsatiumDepositL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These minerals boost the yield of farms when used as a fertilizer.

StringTable.Label: MonsatiumDepositL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These minerals boost the yield of farms when used as a fertilizer.

StringTable.Label: AurorusArboretum_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These staggeringly beautiful bioluminescent trees stand near a Kilometer high, and are considered one of the natural wonders of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: AurorusArboretumL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These bioluminescent trees are one of the natural wonders of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: AurorusArboretumL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These bioluminescent trees are one of the natural wonders of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: AurorusArboretumL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These bioluminescent trees are one of the natural wonders of the galaxy.
